channel.title: Random Theiving teleport

item.title: Random Theiving teleport
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

QuestMaster 2K10:

This is bad man… Put yourself in your player’s shoes (if you even have players) How do you think they would like it when their randomly teleported every other time they click something, that gets extremley annoying, which makes money making frustrating and then eventually player’s can’t find a good money making method and then quit. If your going to add a something to prevent them from getting to much money at a time put timers dumbass.

lolololol, You obviously didn’t read, I said I was bored. So I made this little “snippet”. If you don’t like it, Don’t use it.

But what I love is you took the time to type that. <3 I can feel if you are mad.

Read full topic

item.title: Random Theiving teleport
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“s p i d a z, post:1, topic:346515”]public void randomtelly() { if (misc.random(8) == 1) { changeCoords(x, y, 0); sendMessage("Don't be scared, Its just a random"); } [/quote]

[quote=“s p i d a z, post:1, topic:346515”]public void randomtelly() { if (misc.random(8) == 1) { changeCoords(x, y, 0); [/quote]

[quote=“s p i d a z, post:1, topic:346515”]public void randomtelly() { if (misc.random(8) == 1) { [/quote]

No. It’s 1 out of 9 chances. You must include 0 as a number.

item.title: Random Theiving teleport
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

I was Kinda bored, So I figured I would add a thieving Random, Then I decided Why not make a “guide”

The source I used was battlescape.

It is probably -1 /10 on the hard scale.
First off Search “public void” Throw this under the last }

public void randomtelly() { if (misc.random(8) == 1) { changeCoords(x, y, 0); sendMessage("Don't be scared, Its just a random"); } }
Quick explaination, 1 in 9 chances of this random happening, Change the "X and Y"to a distance a little away from you Stall(s).

Search for “case 4878:” Or what ever your Theiving cases are.

You should find something like this

if (playerLevel[playerThieving] >= 1) { if (invSpace()) { addItem(995, 75000); sendMessage("You manage to steal 75k."); startAnimation(881, 0); thiefDelay = 25; addSkillXP(160 * thiefXpInc, 17); } else sendMessage("Not enough space in your inventory."); } else sendMessage("You need atleast 1 Thieving to steal from this stall."); break;

Pretty much anywhere under neath this code

if (invSpace()) {

throw in **Edit If you do not add it under neath the “addItem(995, 75000);” You could get teleported before you get money.

 randomtelly();

Save, complie, fix errors(if any),
Test.
This took me about 10-15min to write this guide, type this Nooby code.

I understand this is very “nooby” But Really, It just points you in the right direction, You could make this code way way better.

Read full topic
